name: See You In The Dark: REGENTQUEST 1
name_original: See You In The Dark: REGENTQUEST 1
description:
The HTML, CSS, and JavaScript files behind the visual novel at the end of chapter 5 of See You In The Dark, a crossover fanfiction between Worm (web serial by Wildbow) and The Disastrous Life of Saiki K. The game can be played in-browser here.

Contains sprites, background/picture assets, multiple .txt files with modified scripts, the main webpage, and the CSS/HTML. 

drawings.zip: free for download, contains sprites and cutscene illustrations.

regentquest1.zip: contains all files used for this game.
